snippet: Raulie Wayne Casteel, the suspect in 24 shootings in the past month, was arraigned in Oakland County on Friday on 60 charges.
abstract: Raulie Wayne Casteel, suspect in 24 shootings aimed at cars on Interstate 96 in Michigan, is arraigned in Oakland County on 60 charges, including eight counts of assault with intent to commit murder.
lead_paragraph: Raulie Wayne Casteel, the suspect in 24 shootings in the past month, was arraigned in Oakland County on Friday on 60 charges.
